name: hebcal-web
description: Hebcal server-side Node.js for www.hebcal.com and download.hebcal.com

scripts.build: npm run build:cp-json && npm run build:babel
scripts.compress-static: brotli -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_sprite && gzip -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_sprite && brotli -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_clientapp && gzip -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_clientapp && brotli -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_typeaheadcss && gzip -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_typeaheadcss && brotli -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_csprite && gzip -f --keep --best ./static/i/$npm_package_config_csprite
scripts.deploy-rsync: rsync -av ./fonts/ /var/www/fonts/ && rsync -av ./static/ /var/www/html/ && rsync -av ./package.json /var/www/ && rsync -av ./dist/ /var/www/dist/ && rsync -av ./views/ /var/www/dist/views/ && rsync -av ./node_modules/ /var/www/node_modules/ && rsync -av ./node_modules/geolite2-redist/dbs/GeoLite2-*.mmdb /var/www/
scripts.deploy: npm run download-geolite && npm run compress-static && npm run deploy-rsync

author: Michael J. Radwin (https://github.com/mjradwin)
